name: the AI (sappylatice60)
description:
the AI is a game inspired by the Stanley parable and the portal games.

all art, sound, and music is made by me. I used text to speech robot to create the text to speech voice.

  get all 4 endings

control
w or up arrow to go up
s or down arrow to go down
a or left arrow to go left
d or right arrow to go right
hold M for 3 seconds to go to main menu

if there are any bugs, tell me in the comments.
